definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
to be unable to make any sense of the matter/to be at a loss
can't touch/can't reach/(fig.) unable to get a grasp of
not to the point/wide of the mark/neither here nor there/irrelevant
irrelevant/can't make head or tail of
see 偷雞不成蝕把米|偷鸡不成蚀把米[tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3]
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 zhao2 shi2 ba3 mi3

definition: see 數不上|数不上[shu3 bu4 shang4]
lit. like a three-meter high monk, you can't rub his head (idiom)/fig. at a total loss
pinyin: zhang4 er4 he2 shang5 , mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3

definition: see 丈二和尚，摸不著頭腦|丈二和尚，摸不着头脑[zhang4 er4 he2 shang5 , mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3]
pinyin: zhang4 er4 Jin1 gang1 mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3

sentences.english: As far as there is discernible regularity in the succession of phenomena, no recourse to statistics is needed.
sentences.chinese: 至於在現象的連續中有規則性可尋的，就用不著統計。

sentences.english: Sometime what he mutters sounds nothing and elusive.
sentences.chinese: 有時候他好像喃喃自語，內容空洞而不著邊際。

sentences.english: But repeated searches for this myriad population of frosty worlds came up empty-handed .
sentences.chinese: 但是這一大羣冰霜世界，卻遍尋不著。

sentences.english: Now where there is a remission of these, there is no more an oblation for sin.
sentences.chinese: 若這些罪已經赦了，也就用不著贖罪的祭獻了。

sentences.english: He used so many technical terms in his talk that the audience could not make head or tail of it.
sentences.chinese: 他在講話中用了許多專門術語，聽衆簡直摸不著頭腦。

sentences.english: Hearing wild dogs howling, I was so scared that I couldn't sleep all night.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到野狗在號叫，害怕得一整晚都睡不著。

sentences.english: Since she was not in a rush, she ambled home.
sentences.chinese: 既然不著急，她就慢慢地走回家。

sentences.english: E. g. We couldn't make head nor tail of what he was trying to say during his speech.
sentences.chinese: 我們完全摸不著頭腦他那篇演講詞想表達的內容。

sentences.english: For thou verily givest thanks well, but the other is not edified.
sentences.chinese: 你感謝固然是好，但別人卻得不著造就。

definition: to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
